descriptionHTML:
★★★ RUNNING JAPANESE FOR WEARABLE - ANDROID WEAR ★★★

When you are running or walking, you can study japanese word with this wearable application. This is very effective for your fitness & studying language, and easy to use. You can learn english word during your activity.

1. ANDROID WEARABLE DEVICES SUPPORT - SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE & LG G-WATCH
2. REALTIME BURNED CALORIE CHECK SUPPORT
3. REALTIME JAPANESE WORD SUPPORT DURING YOUR ACTIVITY (OVER 2,000 WORDS)

- O2MOBILE SOFTWARE Inc -
